FAC preconditioner on a SAMRAI hierarchy

The FAC preconditioner implemented in the preconditioner class uses a V-cycle. Operations specific to a specific problem are delegated to the FAC operator strategy implementation provided by the user.
  • SAMRAI::solv::FACPreconditioner
  • SAMRAI::solv::FACOperatorStrategy
